trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Minneapolis
There were no other sightings in Minneapolis on or around June 1st 2009
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i walk our dog 3 times a day, in the morning around 6 am, in the afternoon around 3 pm and at night around 9 pm. on june 1st, during our afternoon walk, we we walking in a southerly direction, i turned to face my wife as we were walking, and i noticed two objects in the sky. the sky was mostly clear. the first object i recognized as a jet, based on its shape, consistent speed and the contrail it left behind it, i am convinced it was a conventional aircraft. the second object appeared like a bright spherical dot in contrast to the more recognizable shape of the jet, but what really caught my attention was two things: 1) in sharp contrast to the jet, the movement of the second object was jarring, zipping forward, then suddenly slowed, then jutting forward again. had i seen this object by itself, i am not sure i would have caught the difference, but as the second object seemed to be following the jet, at what seemed like a close distance, 300 feet? it was very obvious in contrast to the jet, that the second object was capable of shifting speed\breaking quite easily. 2) the second object left no contrail. now i am not a pilot, and i have not found one to confirm my suspicion, but i would think that if two aircraft were high enough for one to leave contrails, the other would also leave contrails. i pointed out the phenomenon to my wife, she confirmed that she also saw the same strange contrast between the two objects. this lasted about 30 seconds? then the second object seemed to break off and fly upward\northward\away. the jets stayed its course and both objects disappeared from view.
Summary: Object following jet, left no contrail.
